body_html: @junshi15, Thanks for the suggestion. For 1, I am pretty sure that the RDMA write from worker succeeded, or at least didn't return non-zero value. The evidence is that this line went through, and I did see the code in ibv_post_send() (defined in infiniband/verbs.h) was executed. I will try to look at 2 and 3.

body: @junshi15, Thanks for the suggestion. For 1, I am pretty sure that the RDMA write from worker succeeded, or at least didn't return non-zero value. The evidence is that this [line](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma.cc#L615) went through, and I did see the code in `ibv_post_send()` (defined in `infiniband/verbs.h`) was executed. I will try to look at 2 and 3.
